Detailed Description

A lgObject with duration and time-position.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

lgEvent::lgEvent (  long int  durNum,
long int  durDenom,
int  cdots,
long int  posNum,
long int  posDenom
) 
 

close rangeStack gives the number of ")" which should be placed after "this" in the .gmn out. If any tag or note is added/removed to/from the tag/note list, closeRange needs to be updated -> see lgVoice
